results.title: Agam And
results.brief_description: Looks at Yaacov Agam, one of the world’s foremost Kinetic artists, who uses modernistic and moveable geometric designs in free moving metals, to depict his concept of life and of Judaism. Also deals with Agam’s unique concept of space and reality. Filmed in Israel, Paris and New York, his paintings and sculptures are shown. Music by Abraham Kaplan.
results.description: Looks at Yaacov Agam, one of the world’s foremost Kinetic artists, who uses modernistic and moveable geometric designs in free moving metals, to depict his concept of life and of Judaism. Also deals with Agam’s unique concept of space and reality. Filmed in Israel, Paris and New York, his paintings and sculptures are shown. Music by Abraham Kaplan.

results.title: Against the tide
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Sumner, Interfilm and Robert Tronson
results.brief_description: Individual responsibility and teamwork are the twin themes in a film which links the continuous needs for safety precautions in the ever present dangers in life in the steel works and on the high seas.
results.description: Individual responsibility and teamwork are the twin themes in a film which links the continuous needs for safety precautions in the ever present dangers in life in the steel works and on the high seas.

results.title: Against the escarpment
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Wild Australia”.
A view of wildlife, mainly birds, in natural surroundings in Arnhem Land. Includes a discussion of threats to the ecological balance. Birds shown include the black banded pigeon, brolga, ibis, pygmy and magpie geese

results.title: Against all odds: the story of Australia's North West Shelf Gas Project
results.creator_credit: Woodside Petroleum Ltd and The Film House
results.brief_description: Traces the development of the North West Shelf Gas Project from the discovery of natural gas reserves in the 1970’s to the commissioning of a second off-shore platform in 1995. Highlights the successful export of liquefied natural gas to Japan.
results.title_for_label: Against all odds: the story of Australia’s North West Shelf Gas Project
